property.name: vdcName
property.formula: (SELECT vdc.name FROM iyun_base_vdc vdc WHERE vdc.id = vdc_id)

property.name: firewallName
property.formula: (SELECT firewall.name FROM iyun_vdc_firewall firewall WHERE firewall.id = fwid)

property.name: uuid
property.formula: (SELECT item.uuid FROM iyun_vdc_items item WHERE item.id = id)

property.name: firewallCloudosId
property.formula: (SELECT firewall.cloudos_id FROM iyun_vdc_firewall firewall WHERE firewall.id = fwid)

property.name: externalGateway
property.formula: (SELECT ip.ip_address FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations ip WHERE ip.port_id = gw_port_id LIMIT 1)

property.name: gwPortCdId
property.formula: (SELECT port.cloudos_id FROM iyun_vdc_ports port WHERE port.id = gw_port_id)

property.name: gwNetworkId
property.formula: (SELECT sub.network_id FROM iyun_vdc_subnet sub WHERE sub.id = (SELECT ip.subnet_id FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations ip WHERE ip.port_id = gw_port_id))

property.name: gwNetworkCdId
property.formula: (SELECT net.cloudos_id FROM iyun_vdc_network net WHERE net.id = ((SELECT sub.network_id FROM iyun_vdc_subnet sub WHERE sub.id = (SELECT ip.subnet_id FROM iyun_vdc_ipallocations ip WHERE ip.port_id = gw_port_id))))

property.name: projectName
property.formula: (select t.name from iyun_keystone_project t where t.id = tenant_id)
